localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: Bill Gates says cryptocurrency is one innovation the world could do without https://t.co/sMK9btiF7U
blogPost.author: MarketWatch

localize.full_text: 比尔-盖茨表示，加密货币是世界可以不需要的一种创新https://t.co/sMK9btiF7U。
比爾-蓋茨表示，加密貨幣是世界可以不需要的一種創新https://t.co/sMK9btiF7U。

previous.excerpt: Product fit is the Product/Market fit engine for SaaS companies. Measure and track the PMF of your SaaS application in app with your users. See your PMF score over time, identify the benefits and improvements to focus on from your target market users.
previous.title: Product Fit - Measure product/market fit in app with your users.

localize.description: 产品适配是SaaS企业的产品/市场适配引擎。衡量和跟踪你的SaaS应用在用户应用中的PMF。查看您的PMF得分随着时间的推移，从您的目标市场用户中确定利益和改进的重点。
localize.tagline: 在应用中衡量产品/市场与用户的契合度。

localize.description: 產品適配是SaaS企業的產品/市場適配引擎。衡量和跟蹤你的SaaS應用在用戶應用中的PMF。查看您的PMF得分隨着時間的推移，從您的目標市場用戶中確定利益和改進的重點。
localize.tagline: 在應用中衡量產品/市場與用戶的契合度。

next.excerpt: Clubpad is a soundboard for your Clubhouse rooms 🔥 Show some love with applauses, drop the mic with a DJ horn, fill awkward silences with the jeopardy music, react to bad jokes with the rimshot, use the inception bwaaaaah to add drama, and other memes 📣
next.title: clubpad - Reaction sounds for your Clubhouse rooms

localize.description: Clubpad是你的Clubhouse房间的声板 🔥用掌声来表达爱意，用DJ喇叭来丢掉麦克风，用危险音乐来填补尴尬的沉默，用Rimshot来回应不好的笑话，用inception bwaaaaah来增加戏剧性，以及其他备忘录📣。
Clubpad是你的Clubhouse房間的聲板 🔥用掌聲來表達愛意，用DJ喇叭來丟掉麥克風，用危險音樂來填補尷尬的沉默，用Rimshot來回應不好的笑話，用inception bwaaaaah來增加戲劇性，以及其他備忘錄📣。
